column2: The  instant Appeal relates  to  the  above mentioned sentence  imposed on the
2nd  Accused - Appellant as the Learned Counsel for the Accused Appellant limited
his  argument only  in respect of the  appeal  against the sentence.  When this Appeal
taken  up  for  hearing  the  main  contention  of the  Leaned  Counsel  for

column1: Appellant  was  that  there  is  a  disparity  of sentence  between  the  1 st  and  the  2nd
